article: israeli foreign minister shimon peres is to go to gaza city to meet palestinian leader yasser arafat at midday on monday in a bid to defuse arab anger over israel 's land confiscations , officials said .
abstract: peres meets arafat in bid to calm arab clamor over jerusalem
